pr_title: A lot of devtools-common important fixes

timeline.bodyText: Folder? Is that a Windows jargon? :) I think all the Java API I've seen uses "directory" or "dir".
timeline.author: aloubyansky

replies.bodyText:
oh boy, I've used folder at many places 😬
let me rename it all 😅
replies.author: ia3andy

timeline.message:
Remove Guava usage
Use requireNonNull instead of checkNotNull, and ArrayList as builder.
Use folder Path instead of QuarkusProject in QuarkusProjectCompress#zip
Remove wrongly named common folder to devtools-common
Fix bug where add/remove extension query parsing doesn't work without version
Fix QuarkusProjectCompress when including parent directory
Fix wrong assignement in AppArtifactCoords constructor
